channel.title: CVE Feed for Spring by Pivotal -- Spring Security
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Spring by Pivotal -- Spring Security

item.title: CVE-2018-15801|2024-08-05T10:01:54.649Z -- spring%20by%20pivotal -- spring%20security
item.description: Spring Security versions 5.1.x prior to 5.1.2 contain an authorization bypass vulnerability during JWT issuer validation. In order to be impacted, the same private key for an honest issuer and a malicious user must be used when signing JWTs. In that case, a malicious user could fashion signed JWTs with the malicious issuer URL that may be granted for the honest issuer.
